channel.title: Cigar Daily Brief
channel.description: Daily digest of cigar industry news, releases, and culture.

item.title: Black Works Studio Rolls Out Tigersaurus
item.description: A new limited-edition corona gorda (5½" × 48) featuring tiger-striped wrappers. Limited to 800 boxes for the U.S. and 50 for Europe.

item.title: Micallef Green Hits Shelves Next Week
item.description: Latest in the Color Series arrives Sept 8. Brazilian Mata Fina wrapper, San Andrés Negro binder, Nicaraguan filler with cocoa, coffee, leather notes.

item.title: La Aurora Especiales Re-Launch in U.S.
item.description: Limited-edition cigar from 2022 returns, premiering Sept 11, shipping nationwide in October. Offered in multiple vitolas, priced $13.50–$15.00.

item.title: All Saints Reduces Prices, Discontinues Some Lines
item.description: All Saints announces 14% average price decrease across lineup (effective Sept 1), while cutting select products.

item.title: Casa de Montecristo Opens in West Palm Beach & Chicago
item.description: Casa de Montecristo expands with two new lounge locations, offering premium cigar experiences in Florida and Illinois.
